name: 乱世奇谋Stratagem in troubled times
name_original: 乱世奇谋Stratagem in troubled times
description:
this is a different RPG game



It mainly tells the story of the protagonist helping the princess to realize the rejuvenation and unification, which contains a lot of strategy choices and a small number of round based fighting. Players need to bring themselves into full and make decisions.

story background / H2] [/ b]:

Leng xuyao, the king of Zhou, and his good brothers all along established the state of Zhou. However, the king of Zhou was so greedy for profits that he had to kill his former comrades in arms. As a result, the state of Zhou was in turmoil, and it was even more difficult to establish a foothold in the land which was originally divided by the powerful,

Finally, he was defeated by his former comrades in arms. Except for the princess, our hero set foot on a road of national reunification in order to help, but not only to help the princess. On this road, the protagonist will eventually find his own destiny

how to play the game:



Make a decision, bring yourself fully, simulate what happened, and play a subjective initiative

。
